name: Bullet Heck?
description:
Approaching the end of the universe, the laws of reality collapse into chaos. Matter no longer retains any stable form as alternate timelines collide. As one of the last surviving pilots, battle to erase an armada of yourself from various possible realities. 

There can be only one!

Made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Theme: "Let There Be CHAOS!"

Controls:

W/S or up/down arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to shoot.

P to pause/unpause.

Share your best score!

Credits:

Matthew Sandfrey - Engineering

Jimmy Yik - Engineering

David R. Bowditch - Art

Thomas Iu - Level Design

Christopher Reeves - Music and Sound
